content: the ankylosaurus tom anks - free pattern from my instagram account handmade_by_halime the pattern is written in english and using us crochet terms the pattern is straight forward and easy to follow you need to know the basic crochet skill for amigurumi especially how to work in rounds or spiral some examples of stitches single_crochet bobble stitch increases and decreases materials required yarn i used sport weight 5 ply cotton yarn drops safran crochet hook 2 5 mm fibrefill / toy stuffing stitch markers scissor and embroidery needle security eyes 7 mm size 16 cm in length 6 cm in height when using yarn and hook mentioned above the pattern is a pdf and you will need adobe reader to open it adobe reader is free to download from the internet please note these patterns are for personal use only you may make as many items as you wish for yourself or as gifts you may sell any items you produce from this pattern in small quantities but please link back or give credit to me as the designer please do not share reproduce or sell this pattern or any pictures please respect my rights as a designer please follow my instagram account @handmade_by_halime thank you
